description: Chance The Rapper gave away free rides and free tickets to all Chicagoans.
maintext: After gives away THOUSANDS of backpacks filled with school supplies to Chicago students, Chance The Rapper kept on giving! The rapper hosted free rides and free tickets to all Chicagoans from teachers to dads to a surprise invite-only #BBBash show joined by Future and Jeremih. It was such a success Obama even had a message for him!
title: [Listen] Obama Had A Special Message For Chance The Rapper At His Surprise Show
